about.

Hey there, and thanks for taking the time to pop by and see what I’ve been building over the last few weeks. I want to use this space to mostly learn and try out new concepts like building this website for example, but to also share projects I’m working on and to act as my portfolio.

If you don't know me already, I’m fascinated with technology. Technology to me means a world full of opportunity and it’s personally where I’m at my most creative. I believe as we become more integrated with it the line between real and virtual begins to get blurry. It’s these advancements and working on innovative projects that will shape our future is what motivates me today.
